Package model

Class OrderQueue

java.lang.Object
model.OrderQueue
public class OrderQueue extends Object
The OrderQueue class represents a priority queue for managing customer orders in a restaurant. It allows adding customers to the queue, and it ensures that orders are processed based on a specified priority.

The queue uses a PriorityBlockingQueue to manage customer orders, with the priority being based on the customer ID. The queue also manages the number of available chefs in the restaurant and ensures that orders are processed based on the available chef count.
